mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from third_warehouse
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into third_warehouse (oversea_shipment_no, oversea_shipment_ship_time, awb_no, order_line_num, order_image, sorting_type, brand_id, brand_name, designer_id, color_code, category_id, size, stock_status, third_shipment_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted ) values (#{overseaShipmentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{overseaShipmentShipTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{awbNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderLineNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortingType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{designerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{colorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{thirdShipmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
oversea_shipment_no = #{record.overseaShipmentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
oversea_shipment_ship_time = #{record.overseaShipmentShipTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update third_warehouse set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, oversea_shipment_no = #{record.overseaShipmentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oversea_shipment_ship_time = #{record.overseaShipmentShipTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, awb_no = #{record.awbNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_line_num = #{record.orderLineNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_image = #{record.orderImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sorting_type = #{record.sortingType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, brand_id = #{record.brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, brand_name = #{record.brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, designer_id = #{record.designerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, color_code = #{record.colorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category_id = #{record.categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, size = #{record.size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stock_status = #{record.stockStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, third_shipment_id = #{record.thirdShipmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{record.isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update third_warehouse
oversea_shipment_no = #{overseaShipmentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
oversea_shipment_ship_time = #{overseaShipmentShipTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
awb_no = #{awbNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_line_num = #{orderLineNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_image = #{orderImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sorting_type = #{sortingType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
brand_name = #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
designer_id = #{designerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
color_code = #{colorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

third_shipment_id = #{thirdShipmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update third_warehouse set oversea_shipment_no = #{overseaShipmentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oversea_shipment_ship_time = #{overseaShipmentShipTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, awb_no = #{awbNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_line_num = #{orderLineNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_image = #{orderImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sorting_type = #{sortingType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, brand_name = #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, designer_id = #{designerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, color_code = #{colorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, size = #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stock_status = #{stockStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, third_shipment_id = #{thirdShipmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT s.shipment_no oversea_shipment_no,ss.awb_num awb_no,lp.order_line_num, lps.cover_img order_image,v.sorting_type,lps.brand_id,lps.category_id, p.designer_id,p.color_code,lps.size,b.english_name brand_name FROM logistics_product lp INNER JOIN logistics_product_snapshot lps on lps.logistics_product_id = lp.logistics_product_id INNER JOIN vendor v on v.vendor_id = lp.vendor_id INNER JOIN container c on c.container_id = lp.container_id INNER JOIN shipment s on s.shipment_id = c.shipment_id INNER JOIN sub_shipment ss on ss.shipment_id = s.shipment_id and ss.segment_sequence = 1 INNER JOIN product p on p.product_id = lps.product_id and p.enabled = 1 INNER JOIN brand b on b.brand_id = lps.brand_id WHERE v.enabled = 1 and s.shipment_no = #{shipmentNo};
